page.title: 14HOBBIES AT THIRTEEN.
page.content: My main hobbies are snooker, cycling, collecting and I enjoy most outdoor sports. In snooker you have to concentrate but it can be relaxing. If I get very good at it there is a lot of money in the game. I played the game at the very early age of about six years, where I had to stand on a box to play. I had a big advantage over other boys of my age because we had a snooker table in our house so that my father, a professional player could practise. I like cycling because it keeps you fit. I have to go cycling every day as I am in a team. I have to ride 25 miles a day in an hour or less. I have a special bike which I only use in races on a timed course, and I have a practise bike.
